Reviews.Title: Delightful! (by a very happy iPhone user)
Reviews.Author: Luca Cascianini
Reviews.Content: I got the S3 yesterday, since I owned a iPhone 4S here the comparison:DESIGN: Galaxy S3 design is stunning, the feeling on hands is incredible. The ergonomics makes all the difference. The iPhone 4S is very squarish and definitely more solid but heavier too (way heavier);SCREEN: Galaxy S3 screen is wonderful with vivid colours and sharp imaages, 4,8 inches vs 3.5 of the iPhone, after you make the transition you wont never come back, impossible.OPERATING SYSTEM: S3 usability is a boom. iPhone is good but never at the level of the S3, way way slower.BATTERY: S3 gets full day + 30% remaining battery, iPhone last till four or five PM;GPS: Galaxy S3 gets locked in less than 10 seconds inside a building, iPhone searches and searches with no success;CAMERA: they are very similar, S3 is faster and iPhone is may be a bit better in term of quality. No dramatic difference.S-VOICE vs SIRI: they are both very basic and more fun than usefull.USB-BLUETOOTH: iPhone only works with iTunes, no Bluetooth, no radio. Galaxy S3 can be usb-connected to computers and flashmemory, it has easy bluetooth connection and yes ... it has an amazing radio :)APPS: to be sincere, all relevants apps in iPhones are present in Android. They have better design but they are at payment while in Android are always free. No mayor differences.Galaxy S3 is an extraordinary good purchase. Recommended for all ex-iPhone users. You wont regret, there is a world outside iTunes :)

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Anne P Collette
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems thus far with my phone and have had it for over 5 months now. My only complaint is that I bought the international version, and everything was in French. That was to be expected, and I would have been fine with it, bc all you have to do is go to "settings" and change the language. That was a problem, though, bc I didn't know what the French word for "settings" was. Anyway, thanks to Google translate, I finally got it all figured out:-) I do wish that the retailer would have sent a user manual in English, though, bc the user manual that came with the phone was in about a dozen languages except for English. Otherwise, I am very satisfied with the phone. Thanks and God bless.

Reviews.Title: I9300 Galaxy SIII Unlocked & Straight Talk
Reviews.Author: Rick Holcomb
Reviews.Content: Nice phone.  However this is my first time doing either a smart phone or an Unlocked phone where I had to install a SIM card.  Make sure you know what your getting into.  The SIII uses a micro SIM GSM.  Make sure you select a carrier that uses microSIMS or are willing to cut a full size to a micro.  Cutting tools available on Amazon.  I'm using straigh talk.  I don't know if I would recommend tham.  They are ddeceptive about what carrier they use to provide their service.  In the case of GSM, AT&T; or TMobile.  TMobile sucks for me.  But Straight talk doesn't offer an AT&T; compatible SIM card any longer.  You can find them on Amazon if you look, for a price.  The only issue I had with the phone is that it is the international version, which was not stated in Amazon advertisement.  Minor, issue but all my temps are in centigrade and I can't figure out how to change it.  I would check the manufacurers web site for any unlocked phone to insure your getting a US version and to dertimine what SIM it needs.

Reviews.Content: I' m completely satisfied with this phone. Good camera, fast, and FREE!Better than iPhone or Windos Phone. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: swindle, chea order 4138032 cta 104-2863073-4462633  date 9/24/2013
Reviews.Author: Fernando C.
Reviews.Content: SIRS:AMAZON.COMTGU ENTERPRISESeptember 24 buy a new cell phone brand Samsung Galaxy SIII I9300 (pebble blue) model of 16 gb unlocked which offered through amazon.com, according to attached invoice, a month of using the phone, the battery included in the same began to present failures and to bulge is and not is recharging, signal that is damaged, and offering the phone said that he has a one year warranty.I started to look for a new battery to replace the former and not the with him, since here in Venezuela which sold is larger and they are those manufactured in the United States, also informed me that this phone was Chinese and not original, which has me upset to review it after this information model is not cell as says on the box and label inside of the phone, if not that model that appears in the telephone system is VHS-E210K and has 25.4 gb instead of 16 gb, searching the internet tell me that it could be a Korean version then communicated by phone with SAMSUNG people to verify the origin of the phone and confirm that it is original supplier model, serial and IMEI of the same, and informed me that this phone was not manufactured by Samsung, I need to explain this to me and solve my problemKind regardsFernando HunPhone: 58 424 2143502

Reviews.Title: Excellent cell for US and Europe
Reviews.Author: DARKO S.
Reviews.Content: All I need is implemented in this cell phone. It is unlocked and you can use it both in USA and Europe (Croatia, 3G and 4G). Charger is US-standard, so you'll need adapter for European outlets. Works fine after three weeks, no problems. Specs are as described. Great phone, nice price, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone. Only outclassed by its' Galaxy successors.
Reviews.Author: James Krznaric
Reviews.Content: The phone is fast, especially on 4G. It takes phenomenal pictures. Its' battery life is very impressive compared to other smart phones. The screen is amazing for videos and other multimedia, and I do not care what anyone says. I WOULD MUCH RATHER USE THIS THAN AN IPHONE! THE GALAXY S3 IS FAR SUPERIOR TO ANY RELEASED IPHONES!

Reviews.Title: 100% recommended

Reviews.Content: very good product, I have a month with the phone and I have no concern. 100% recommended this unlocked... all fine!

Reviews.Title: Love the phone:
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Lewis
Reviews.Content: Received the phone before delivery date from user. 5 star+ from me. Getting the phone up and running no problem. Charged fully prior to using. Using straight talk, a slight pain in the butt when done it works great. Take your time getting to know your phone but well worth the purchase. Thanks and love it. Glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: galaxy s3 is good but phone sd micro card doesnt work at all and has no solution
Reviews.Author: lincoln karez
Reviews.Content: this phone came from united kindom and samsung give warranty only in united kindom.I bought one very good and fast micro sd card and canot use in phone because does not work.phone is very good but not work 100 %.it has a slot for micro sd card and I cannot use it.next time I will buy a iphone 5 because apple give you international warranty everywhere and iphone 5 does not have a slot to use micro sd card.I send a email to samsung unites kindom and they cannot help me.next tme when I travel to united kindom  I will try to fix my phone.and they said this is a global world.It is not true .what can I do.only write this review and hope someone in samsung read this and help me.big company small problems no solution.phone is very good. galaxy s3 work diferent from galaxy s2 .I canot trasfer data and apps to microsd .only films books and midia.i didnt know.phone works great.i am very happy with my phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone Is Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Mc "blessed1"
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about a month now and currently have no complaints with it.  I definitely enjoy the screen size.  The battery life is great for me.  At the end of each day, I still have over 70% of the battery life left.  I don't do social networking so that may be why.The sound quality is great, the camera takes great pictures.I bought this phone to use with a prepaid plan which works great.  I would recommend this phone to my friends.
